text: Cherthala railway station (Code: SRTL) is a (NSG 5 Category) railway station in Alappuzha District, Kerala, and falls under the Thiruvananthapuram railway division of the Southern Railway Zone, Indian Railways. Category:Railway stations in Alappuzha district Category:Railway stations opened in 1989 Category:1989 establishments in India Category:Thiruvananthapuram railway division
title: Cherthala railway station
